DOC.detailed_description: HTM develop `` TELLYHealth ( tm ) system '' provide education hearing aid use maintenance , troubleshotting guide , patient diary . The content include interactive lesson real-world communication strategy help patient derive maximum value hearing aid . HTM conduct randomize control trial ( RCT ) quantify benefit TELLYHealth patient audiologists include : reduction hear handicap , improve knowledge hear aid handling , use communication strategy ; improve audiologist aftercare . The investigator recruit 80 subject ( half group ) subject participate study 12 week .
